creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
description: firm brown small crown cap; flap at back; cut threads around top indicate something was once attached and also around brim; false braid of black silk threads (long) attached to back flap; inside of flap has a few long black threads attached with gold braid
dimension:
5 x 4 1/2 in. (12.7 x 11.43 cm)
22 in. (55.88 cm) (object part, braid)
21 1/2 in. (54.61 cm) (object part, threads)
title: Woman's cap
